entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of rain or freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers with periods of freezing rain early in the morning and with drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
